name: Kirin Strike
prerequisiteFormula: @int_score >= 13 AND @feat:kirin_style AND @feat:improved_unarmed_strike AND @skill:knowledge_arcana >= 9 AND (@skill:knowledge#dungeoneering >= 3 OR @skill:knowledge#local >= 3 OR @skill:knowledge#planes >= 3 OR @skill:knowledge#religion >= 3)
descriptionText: You have read the texts of the perfect way, and know how identify to your enemies' weak spot.
